raw_comment:
What do you notice?
I notice that most young people are optomistic about the future. I also notice that Indonesia is very high even though it is often considered a poor country.
What do you wonder?
Why do Brazil and Mali place so low?
How does this relate to you and your community?
I think a lot of people around me are optomistic about the future. 
What’s going on in this graph? Create a catchy headline that captures the graph’s main idea.

Optimism among the young?
ace_sentences: Most young people are optimistic about the future.
Indonesia has a very high value in the graph.
Many people consider Indonesia a poor country.
Brazil has a low value in the graph.
Mali has a low value in the graph.
I wonder why Brazil has a low value in the graph.
I wonder why Mali has a low value in the graph.
This graph relates to me and my community.
Many people around me are optimistic about the future.
The headline is: Optimism among the young?
